metadata.name: HackTool - CrackMapExec Execution Patterns
metadata.comment: Detects various execution patterns of the CrackMapExec pentesting framework

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.*cmd\.exe /q /c .* 1> \\.*\*\* 2>&1.*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.*cmd\.exe /c .* > \\.*\*\* 2>&1.*' OR lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.*cmd\.exe /c .* > .*\\temp\* 2>&1.*' OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell.exe -exec bypass -noni -nop -w 1 -c "')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('powershell.exe -noni -nop -w 1 -enc '))))

output.summary: Detects various execution patterns of the CrackMapExec pentesting framework
